other_tests.findings: The patient had been planned for G tube removal.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The patient reported good progress at rehab; he has not required the use of his trach for mechanical ventilation in months and has been able to eat and swallow pills.

other_tests.procedure_name: DVT management with Coumadin and Lovenox
other_tests.findings: The patient had a history of DVT and has been on Coumadin, which was held and bridged with Lovenox for the past 2 days.
